verbose_text: Such a lifespan extending effect might be anticipated from the known longevity effects of nutrient restriction [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR] and reduced DAF-2 signalling [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR], both of which may mediate a lowering of glucose uptake.
evidence: DAF-2 signalling [ XREF_BIBR , XREF_BIBR ], both of which may mediate a lowering of glucose
